events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because the size I ordered does not fit me at all.
The customer's message mentions a refund request due to sizing issues, categorizing this case under Refund.
Assigning this refund request case to agent Sara M. who handles returns and money-back requests.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to request a refund for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product has been opened or worn so we can proceed with the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new; I have not worn it, just tried it on and found it too small.
Thank you for the info. I have initiated your refund request. Please use the prepaid label we will email you to send the jacket back within 14 days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate that the label is prepaid, it makes the process easier.
We have confirmed receipt of your returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to reflect.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Closing your case now as the refund has been successfully processed and no further issues were reported.
